The AfD disbanded its previous youth organization, the "Junge Alternative" ("Young Alternative"), after it was deemed too radical and was categorized by German law enforcement as right-wing extreme. The new organization is to be called "Generation Deutschland" ("Generation Germany"). The AfD is currently leading in polls by a wide margin in all five eastern German states, in part due to an effective social media campaign targeting young voters. (Photo by Florian Wiegand/Getty Images)
